headline.main: Lessons for the Future; Sicily and Aleutians Showed Some Errors Corrected but Revealed New Mistakes

lead_paragraph: The impending invasion of Italy -- now more and more clearly forecast by the pattern of preliminary bombardment -- and the coming battles of the Pacific will be a definite measure of the lessons that we have learned and the experience that we have gained in the preliminary operations now ended.
abstract: H W Baldwin on impending Allied mainland invasion
